I do have diabetes and hypothyroidism,  both autoimmune.  Link to photo: https://postimg.org/image/ve18etp09/ or https://s27.postimg.org/nmwk34yo3/2017_01_16_09_53_01.jpg . title: psoriasis or eczema on eye lids, inside ears?
